title: Call It What You Want
lyrics: My castle crumbled overnight<BREAKER>I brought a knife to a gunfight<BREAKER>They took the crown, but it's alright<BREAKER>All the liars are calling me one<BREAKER>Nobody's heard from me for months<BREAKER>I'm doing better than I ever was

'Cause my baby's fit like a daydream<BREAKER>Walkin' with his head down, I'm the one he's walkin' to<BREAKER>So call it what you want, yeah, call it what you want to<BREAKER>My baby's fly like a jet stream<BREAKER>High above the whole scene, loves me like I'm brand new<BREAKER>So call it what you want, yeah, call it what you want to

All my flowers grew back as thorns<BREAKER>Windows boarded up after the storm<BREAKER>He built a fire just to keep me warm<BREAKER>All the drama queens taking swings<BREAKER>All the jokers dressin' up as kings<BREAKER>They fade to nothin' when I look at him

And I know I make the same mistakes every time<BREAKER>Bridges burn, I never learn, at least I did one thing right<BREAKER>I did one thing right<BREAKER>I'm laughin' with my lover, makin' forts under covers<BREAKER>Trust him like a brother, yeah, you know I did one thing right<BREAKER>Starry eyes sparkin' up my darkest night

My baby's fit like a daydream<BREAKER>Walkin' with his head down, I'm the one he's walkin' to<BREAKER>So call it what you want, yeah, call it what you want to<BREAKER>My baby's fly like a jet stream<BREAKER>High above the whole scene, loves me like I'm brand new<BREAKER>(Call it what you want, call it what you want, call it)<BREAKER>So call it what you want, yeah, call it what you want to

I want to wear his initial<BREAKER>On a chain 'round my neck, chain 'round my neck<BREAKER>Not because he owns me<BREAKER>But 'cause he really knows me<BREAKER>Which is more than they can say, I<BREAKER>I recall late November<BREAKER>Holdin' my breath, slowly I said<BREAKER>"You don't need to save me<BREAKER>But would you run away with me?"<BREAKER>Yes (would you run away?)

My baby's fit like a daydream<BREAKER>Walkin' with his head down, I'm the one he's walkin' to<BREAKER>(Call it what you want, call it what you want, call it)<BREAKER>So call it what you want, yeah, call it what you want to<BREAKER>My baby's fly like a jet stream<BREAKER>High above the whole scene, loves me like I'm brand new<BREAKER>(Call it what you want, call it what you want, call it)<BREAKER>So call it what you want, yeah, call it what you want to
Call it what you want, yeah, call it what you want<BREAKER>To
